page.title: 07Farming_an Exmoor Farm
page.content: Farming at my home hardly ever stops.Mum is up in the morning at six o'clock and gets to bed nearly always after midnight.There is always something to do, whether it's mucking out sheds, making concrete,doing up old buildings or feeding the cows, calves ,sheep,chickens,rabbits,gos _lings and chicks. Farming is good fun most of the time,when it isn't tipping down with rain.I have to do the gardening in my spare time.We usually make a garden in the corner of a field but this year the ploughed field is so far away that I dug a garden by the paddock.If we do get a day when everything seems to be going well then we go swimming, but that's only once or twice a year.
